titleStmt.title: The burthen of the ministerie Gathered out of the sixt chapiter of the Epistles of S. Paul to the Galathians, the first verse. Verie profitable to be read of euery faithfull subiect, and of all that desire to be taught in the waie of truth. By Iohn Holme.
titleStmt.author: Holme, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Danter for Iohn Winnington,

notesStmt.note: The verse number is cited erroneously as 'first' on the title page, correctly as '5' on B1r.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
